subject: Automobile Racing
Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: J. R. Hildebrand seems to have moved on from the Indy 500 in May, when he crashed on the final turn and lost to Dan Wheldon.
snippet: J. R. Hildebrand seems to have moved on from the Indy 500 in May, when he crashed on the final turn and lost to Dan Wheldon.
